salesforce-enterprise-campaigns.title: Senior Manager, Enterprise Campaigns
salesforce-enterprise-campaigns.longSummary: Integrated Marketing Campaigns, Events, and ABM leader focused on Enterprise-level accounts, including many Fortune 50 companies. Built integrated, solution-focused programs by combining product marketing, field events, BDR coaching, and partner engagement.
responsibilities: Owned enterprise Service Cloud demand generation strategy for key industries.
Developed integrated marketing motions spanning digital, events, and BDR outreach.
Partnered with Product Marketing, Sales, and Partners to define campaign narratives.
Designed BDR coaching and follow-up processes to ensure pipeline progression.
bullets: Business owner for Enterprise Service Cloud demand generation campaigns, including pipeline strategy, messaging, and tactic mix.
Directed execution and follow-up for major industry tradeshows (e.g., NRF for Retail, HIMSS for Healthcare).
Authored an operations enablement guide for maximizing on-site presence, segmented sales messaging, and executive engagement.
Established an Account-Based Marketing (ABM) Center of Excellence Program, designing methodology and documentation for customer journeys using propensity data.
Increased pipeline from key target accounts by approximately 30% year-over-year.

salesforce-marketing-ops-practice-leader.title: Global Marketing Operations Practice Leader
salesforce-marketing-ops-practice-leader.longSummary: Developed and led a global marketing operations practice for Non-Profit and Education teams, transforming how demand-generation performance was measured and operationalized.
responsibilities: Supported ~95 global marketers across demand gen, field marketing, events, and product marketing.
Designed and maintained a full-funnel reporting framework using Salesforce and Tableau.
Provided role-specific enablement and office hours for campaign managers and field marketers.
Partnered with Sales Ops and leadership to align KPIs and dashboard views.
bullets: Developed a data-driven demand generation reporting structure covering the entire funnel from inquiry to closed won.
Engineered migration of spreadsheet-based scorecards to Tableau dashboards, cutting reporting refresh and delivery time from 4 days to 2 hours (≈190% time savings).
Led activation and training on Salesforce dashboards, campaign management, and database utilization.
Helped drive a 76% year-over-year increase in marketing-sourced pipeline and a 63% YoY increase in ACV.
Directed a multinational team to overhaul strategy and operations, increasing lead generation by 150% in the first year.

redhat-abm.title: Senior Principal Program Manager, Account-Based Marketing
redhat-abm.longSummary: Led ABM program design and lifecycle strategy in the Global Program Office, enabling field marketers around the world to execute consistent, data-driven customer growth programs.
responsibilities: Designed the ABM Customer Activation framework and rollout strategy.
Built multi-product customer lifecycle playbooks to support sales, CS, and marketing.
Partnered with Sales, Ops, Product Management, and Customer Success on shared KPIs and execution plans.
Standardized requirements gathering and feedback loops with field teams.
bullets: Developed the ABM Customer Activation framework that supported 200+ enterprise customers and 65+ field marketers.
Contributed to approximately 33% of Red Hat’s global pipeline via ABM-led programs.
Created reusable lifecycle playbooks to guide upsell, cross-sell, and retention motions.
Directed aggregation and analysis of customer engagement data, enabling faster and more targeted programs.
Standardized intake and requirements processes with Product Management and Customer Success to streamline execution and improve customer experience.

prgx-digital-abm.title: Director of Digital Marketing & ABM
prgx-digital-abm.longSummary: Director-level leader owning digital, ABM, and marketing operations at PRGX. Focused on building a unified stack, consistent data capture, and scalable campaigns that directly connect to pipeline and revenue.
responsibilities: Global ABM lead and admin for Demandbase, Salesforce, Qualified, and related tools.
Designed digital experiences that balanced strong UX with robust data capture and attribution.
Oversaw SEO, paid search, and paid social programs including agency partnerships.
Led a team of three marketers focused on campaign execution and analytics.
Built marketing operations foundations including scoring, attribution, and stack governance.
bullets: Served as global ABM lead for ~300 target accounts, managing system design and sales enablement for Demandbase, Salesforce, and Qualified.
Redesigned and optimized web and content experiences to support persona- and vertical-specific Demandbase personalization.
Continuously optimized SEO and paid search, improving visibility, conversion rates, and pipeline influence in partnership with external agencies.
Designed and executed data-driven campaigns in Marketo and paid social channels, lifting MQL-to-SQL conversion by roughly 180% YoY.
Acted as primary admin for Salesforce, Demandbase, ZoomInfo, Marketo, Qualified, and WordPress to maximize adoption and process efficiency.
Established a formal Marketing Operations practice including revamped lead scoring and an updated attribution model.
Led and coached a team of three, regularly training on how to build high-performing campaigns and analytics that create measurable pipeline impact.
Led prioritization of automation and workflow improvements in CRM and MAP to support multi-touch, multi-channel campaigns.
